createHash

private static java.lang.String createHash(char[] password)
                                    throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                           java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
Returns a salted PBKDF2 hash of the password.

参数：
password - the password to hash
返回：
a salted PBKDF2 hash of the password
抛出：
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

static java.lang.String createSalt()

validatePassword

static boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String correctHash)
验证密码和原密码是否匹配

参数：
password - 输入密码
correctHash - 原加密密码
返回：

validatePassword

private static boolean validatePassword(char[] password,
                                        java.lang.String correctHash)
                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
Validates a password using a hash.

参数：
password - the password to check
correctHash - the hash of the valid password
返回：
true if the password is correct, false if not
抛出：
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

slowEquals

private static boolean slowEquals(byte[] a,
                                  byte[] b)
Compares two byte arrays in length-constant time. This comparison method is used so that password hashes cannot be extracted from an on-line system using a timing attack and then attacked off-line.

参数：
a - the first byte array
b - the second byte array
返回：
true if both byte arrays are the same, false if not

pbkdf2

private static byte[] pbkdf2(char[] password,
                             byte[] salt,
                             int iterations,
                             int bytes)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
Computes the PBKDF2 hash of a password.

参数：
password - the password to hash.
salt - the salt
iterations - the iteration count (slowness factor)
bytes - the length of the hash to compute in bytes
返回：
the PBDKF2 hash of the password
抛出：
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

fromHex

private static byte[] fromHex(java.lang.String hex)
Converts a string of hexadecimal characters into a byte array.

参数：
hex - the hex string
返回：
the hex string decoded into a byte array

toHex

private static java.lang.String toHex(byte[] array)
Converts a byte array into a hexadecimal string.

参数：
array - the byte array to convert
返回：
a length*2 character string encoding the byte array
